titleStmt.title: The moste true reporte of Iames Fitz Morrice death, and others the like offe[n]ders: with a brief discourse of rebellion, dedicated to the ribht [sic] worshipfull my louying freende M. Drewe Drewrie, brother to the honourable sir Willyam Drewrie, lorde Iustice of Irelande. Written by Thomas Churchyard Gent
titleStmt.author: Churchyard, Thomas, 1520?-1604.

publicationStmt.publisher: By [Felix Kingston for] Edward VVhite, dwellyng at the little northdore of S. Paules churche, at the signe of the Gunne,

notesStmt.note: Actual printer's name supplied and publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the little northdore of S. Paules churche, at the signe of the Gunne
